apiDescription: Spawns tasks that poll futures to completion onto its associated task executor.
The term "task" refers to a kind of lightweight "thread". Task executors are responsible for scheduling the execution of tasks on operating system threads.

trait required methods.name: fn spawn_obj( &mut self, future: FutureObj<'static, ()>) -> Result<(), SpawnObjError>
